DOC.brief_summary: The goal project develop pilot test community-based integrate care model improve prevention , early detection treatment child mental health problem replicable , effective , sustainable . Project procedures include child mental health screening , on-site brief mental health intervention , referral specialty mental health , use co-located child psychiatrist , detection need primary care specialty mental health program . Subjects enrol 1 year , interview baseline 3 , 6 12 month . Dr. Bonnie Zima UCLA contract project funder design implement evaluation project , include develop data collection procedure , train staff implementation data collection workflow , coordinate site ensure evaluation design IRB protocols follow , coordinate study site verify data reliability . Some potential anticipated risk include uncomfortable answering question associate measure use study , although unlikely , someone may access participant information confidential . Some benefit include help find way improve deliver mental health care child serve publicly-funded primary care mental health clinic .
DOC.brief_title: H3 : Healthy Minds , Healthy Children , Healthy Chicago Project Evaluation
DOC.detailed_description: UCLA charge evaluation H3 project , include evaluation design oversee data collection project sit . UCLA receive data collect site perform analysis data site share Illinois Children 's Healthcare Foundation clinic site . This study evaluate exist intervention , mean participation evaluation require order receive H3 service . The information include evaluation design document attach 10.1 , 1.0 : The overarch goal Healthy Minds , Healthy Children , Healthy Chicago Initiative ( H3 ) develop community-based integrate care model improve prevention , early detection treatment child mental health problem replicable , effective , sustainable . The final study design longitudinal cohort study 400 child age 0-17 year family serve two intervention clinic site ( n=200/site ) The study time point baseline , 3- , 6- , 12-months . The data source parent youth report , clinic administrative data feasible program transfer data follow IRB-approved procedure . The unit analysis child . The main proximal ( short term ) clinical outcome related H3 intervention care process ( e.g. , brief mental health intervention , referral specialty mental health care , co-located child psychiatrist ) . The time period likely vary child depend clinical need , anticipate care process provide early phase child parent introduce new care model . The main distal outcome ( long-term ) clinical improvement ( e.g. , child symptom reduction , improve functioning ) correspond care process deliver ( e.g. , parent receives parent training , improvement parent skill assess ) . The time point track clinical improvement 3 , 6 12 month baseline interview do parent child enrol evaluation . The independent variable ( factor may influence care process clinical outcome ) child sociodemographic characteristic ( e.g . age , sex , race/ethnicity ) , psychosocial complexity , primary caregiver characteristic clinic team Community Advisory Board deem relevant ( e.g. , parent stress , probable depression ) . Embedded within description child 's psychosocial complexity indicator social determinant ( e.g . exposure trauma ) may adversely impact child 's development well-being . Findings evaluation provide data acceptability feasibility H3 care model , well early indicator whether care model promise .
